## Public Member Functions

### materialize() {#aa93cd3271fdfaf01ae742ddaf5e6d9fc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; FatPtrConstMaterializer::materialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method can be implemented to generate a mapped Value on demand.

For example, if linking lazily. Returns null if the value is not materialized.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp/#l01165">1165</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp">AMDGPULowerBufferFatPointers.cpp</a>.
